00055 typedef enum SIPX_CALLSTATE_MAJOR
00056 {
00057     UNKNOWN         = 0,    
00060     NEWCALL         = 1000, 
00064     DIALTONE        = 2000, 
00068     REMOTE_OFFERING = 2500, 
00075     REMOTE_ALERTING = 3000, 
00083     CONNECTED       = 4000, 
00087     DISCONNECTED    = 5000, 
00092     OFFERING        = 6000, 
00098     ALERTING        = 7000, 
00104     DESTROYED       = 8000, 
00108 } SIPX_CALLSTATE_MAJOR ;
